sources.title: FastAPI Documentation - Building APIs
sources.synthesis: FastAPI provides async request handling with automatic OpenAPI schema generation, ideal for MCP protocol implementation with <500ms response times.

sources.title: Model Context Protocol Specification
sources.synthesis: MCP defines stdio and HTTP transports for tool-based agent communication. Servers expose tools via JSON-RPC 2.0 with structured schemas.

sources.title: ngrok Documentation - Secure Tunnels
sources.synthesis: ngrok provides stable HTTPS tunneling for local servers with >99% uptime, enabling external access to MCP servers for watsonx.orchestrate.
